Question: This person received as much as $60,000 for a speech, and did as many as 80 in a year.
Hints: On April 4, the Rick Santorum campaign shifted its position and urged this person to drop out of the race and support Santorum.
In 1961, this person graduated from Baker High School in Columbus, Georgia.
In 1970, this person joined the history department at West Georgia College as an assistant professor.
